alert.note: Alert for Lake (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 2:28AM EDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Will, southeastern DuPage, Cook and northern Lake Counties through 215 AM CDT... At 128 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Elmhurst to Lockport to near Minooka. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chicago, Joliet, Cicero, Hammond, Gary, Bolingbrook, Orland Park, Tinley Park, Oak Lawn, Berwyn, Oak Park, Downers Grove, Elmhurst, Romeoville, Calumet City, Merrillville, Woodridge, Chicago Heights, West Town and Chicago Lawn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
